snippet: The suicide bomber who killed more than 100 people in Somalia on Tuesday was a dropout who had declared that young people should forget about secular education and instead wage jihad.
lead_paragraph: The suicide bomber who killed more than 100 people in Somalia on Tuesday was a dropout who had declared that young people should forget about secular education and instead wage jihad.

headline.main: Somalia: Suicide Bomber Opposed Secular Studies
headline.seo: Somalia: Suicide Bomber Opposed Secular Studies
